info:
Below you'll find details on options that you can change inside {{CONFIG_FILE}}.
If you try to use invalid values or mess up in another way, the options will be reset to their defaults.
If you want to reset all settings to their defaults, simply delete {{CONFIG_FILE}}.
A new config file with all default values will then be generated the next time you start the game.
Note that changes in {{CONFIG_FILE}} DON'T apply immediately! You'll have to restart the game.

options.Name: Version
options.Description: Don't change this. Otherwise all your settings will be discarded!

options.Name: EnablePatch
options.Description:
Patch will be enabled if this is set to true.
Nothing will be patched/changed if this is set to false.

options.Name: IgnoreGameCheck
options.Description:
By default the patch will check if the game you're running really is Yakuza 3.
Don't change this unless you have a good reason to do so.

options.Name: ShowHeatValues
options.Description:
Shows the current Heat value and drain timer during combat if set to true.
Used for testing, best to keep this set to false for regular gameplay.
Note that the maximum drain timer will always be 115 (for technical reasons).
To get around that limitation my patch instead increases the time between each increment.

options.Name: UseOldPatch
options.Description:
Set to true to use the old (flawed) patch instead of the new one.
Used for testing, best to keep this set to false for regular gameplay.
Note that the old patch DOESN'T support ANY of the options below!

options.Name: DrainTimeMulti
options.Description:
Multiplies the time until Heat starts to drain on its own.
Set to 1 for Yakuza 3 Remastered behavior. (Drain starts after ~2 seconds)
Set to 2 for Yakuza 3 PS3 behavior. (Drain starts after ~4 seconds)

options.Name: FixHeatDrain
options.Description:
Set to true for Yakuza 3 PS3 Heat drain rates.
Set to false for Yakuza 3 Remastered (i.e. bugged) Heat drain rates.

options.Name: FixHeatGain
options.Description:
Set to true for Yakuza 3 PS3 Heat gain rates.
Set to false for Yakuza 3 Remastered (i.e. bugged) Heat gain rates.

options.Name: DisableHeatDrain
options.Description:
Heat will never drain on its own if this is set to true.
Heat loss by getting damaged or using Heat moves will still happen though.

options.Name: InfiniteHeat
options.Description: Grants you infinite Heat if set to true.

options.Name: ZeroHeat
options.Description:
Permanently sets your Heat to 0 (i.e. empty) if set to true.
Will still allow you to charge up "Feel the Heat" like normal.
InfiniteHeat will take priority over ZeroHeat if both are set to true.
